categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire
Category:Personnel of the Central Committee's faction

nodes.text: Heingort Giddis was a male Null Imperial Intelligence agent masquerading as Jedgar, a Prophet of the Dark Side.

The false Prophets of the Dark Side included an imitator of Jedgar. He was responsible for greeting visitors to the Scardia Station. The false Jedgar filled the same position as the true Jedgar, acting as the second in command of the Prophets as well as Kadann's bodyguard. Additionally, he appeared to have roughly the same personality as the true Jedgar.
